recipesJson.name: Cherry Oak Tobacco
recipesJson.author: ChemicalBurnVictim
recipesJson.description:
A cherry oak pipe tobacco. Pretty simple. 

A while back @matthewkocanda was talking about a cherry oak pipe tobacco that someone used to roll for him (or something like that.) Thought it sounded like a fun thing to try out, so I mixed this up, and itâ€™s pretty gosh darn good.
